mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.lcid AS "lcid", a.info_type AS "infoType", a.content AS "content", a.title AS "title", a.public_unit AS "publicUnit", a.public_date AS "publicDate", a.file_name AS "fileName", a.file_preffix AS "filePreffix", a.sort AS "sort", a.file_url AS "fileUrl", a.file_path AS "filePath", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.display_flag AS "displayFlag", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pub_expropriation_detail_info( lcid, info_type, sort, content, title, public_unit, public_date, file_name, file_preffix, file_url, file_path, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date, display_flag, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{lcid}, #{infoType}, #{sort}, #{content}, #{title}, #{publicUnit}, #{publicDate}, #{fileName}, #{filePreffix}, #{fileUrl}, #{filePath}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{displayFlag}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pub_expropriation_detail_info SET lcid = #{lcid}, info_type = #{infoType}, sort = #{sort}, content = #{content}, title = #{title}, public_unit = #{publicUnit}, public_date = #{publicDate}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_preffix = #{filePreffix}, file_url = #{fileUrl}, file_path = #{filePath}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, display_flag = #{displayFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
